Big picture: Fits post-assessment pre-authorization in lifecycle; critical for hybrid/FedRAMP environments. Prerequisites: Basic RMF, ATO, reciprocity. Best Practices: Assess external ATOs, document rationale, continuous monitoring, supply chain controls. Sources: NIST SP 800-37 Rev. 2, NIST SP 800-161, FedRAMP guidelines. Output ONLY in JSON array of flashcards, each with: {'layer': 1-4, 'bloom_level': 'REMEMBER', 'type': 'Q&A|MCQ|etc.', 'front': '...', 'back': {'answer': '...', 'explanation': '...', 'references': '...'}}. Generate 25 flashcards balanced across levels/layers. Follow distractor protocol strictly for MCQs.
